name: Brightcast
tag_list: web-streaming, internet-broadcasting, pod-casting, encoding, broadcast-solutions, streaming, media-marketing, marketing, communications, internet-communications
overview: Brightcast are a Sydney-based technology company specialising in web streaming of events, conferences, seminars, product launches, communocations programs, training and conference seminars. Location audio and video recording, along with post-event production are also handled. Multiple format encoding such as Windows Media, Flash and .mp3 is available. Efficient and cost-effective media streaming from a company with strong front-line production and conference experience.
